testcase.description: Description Verify that the WMM in 11ng /11na mode Test procedure 1. Verify that the WMM take effect. Result 1 2. Verify that no WMM info by cmd: no ssid xxxx wmm, result 2. Expect result 1. The Mgt frame include wmm element. 2. The mgt frame no wmm element.

step.desc: Set config for AP1 via telnet to
step.telnet: -v "interface wifi0 mode access" -v "radio profile na" -v "radio profile na phymode 11na" -v "interface wifi0 radio profile na" -v "ssid ${ssid.name}1" -v "interface wifi0 ssid ${ssid.name}1" -v "no ssid ${ssid.name}1 wmm" -v "ssid ${ssid.name}2" -v "interface wifi0 ssid ${ssid.name}2" -v "interface wifi0 radio channel 36" -v "save config"
-v "no filter 1" -v "filter 1 l2 mgmt subtype 8" -v "capture save interface wifi0 ws_wmm.pcap" -v "capture interface wifi0 count 300 filter 1"

step.desc: Transmit pkts from AP to master
Use Tshark convert pcap file to packet tree

step.script: export NO_WMM=$(perl ${bin.dir}/parse_pcap.pl -f ${log.dir}/ws_wmm.log -k ${DUT1_WIFI01_MAC} -o "WME") echo "NO_WMM = $NO_WMM" if [ "$NO_WMM" != "No_match_packet_found" ] then exit 1 fi
export BE=$(perl ${bin.dir}/parse_pcap.pl -f ${log.dir}/ws_wmm.log -k ${DUT1_WIFI02_MAC} -k "WME" -o "Best Effort") echo "BE = $BE" if [ -z "$BE" ] then exit 1 fi
export BK=$(perl ${bin.dir}/parse_pcap.pl -f ${log.dir}/ws_wmm.log -k ${DUT1_WIFI02_MAC} -k "WME" -o "Background") echo "BK = $BK" if [ -z "$BK" ] then exit 1 fi
export VI=$(perl ${bin.dir}/parse_pcap.pl -f ${log.dir}/ws_wmm.log -k ${DUT1_WIFI02_MAC} -k "WME" -o "Video") echo "VI = $VI" if [ -z "$VI" ] then exit 1 fi
export VO=$(perl ${bin.dir}/parse_pcap.pl -f ${log.dir}/ws_wmm.log -k ${DUT1_WIFI02_MAC} -k "WME" -o "Voice") echo "VO = $VO" if [ -z "$VO" ] then exit 1 fi

step.desc: Set config for AP1 via telnet to

step.telnet: -v "no filter 1" -v "filter 1 l2 mgmt subtype 8" -v "capture save interface wifi0 ws_wmm_later.pcap" -v "capture interface wifi0 count 200 filter 1"

step.desc: Transmit pkts from AP to master
Use Tshark convert pcap file to packet tree

step.script: export WMM_LATER=$(perl ${bin.dir}/parse_pcap.pl -f ${log.dir}/ts_wmm_later.log -k ${DUT1_WIFI01_MAC} -o "WME") echo "WMM_LATER = $WMM_LATER" if [ "$WMM_LATER" = "No_match_packet_found" ] then exit 1 fi
